title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Nineteen years ago, everyone waved the flag, police were America's heroes after 9/11. Now is a time to choose: You're with the mob or you're with the police. BLM protesters block LA ER where ambushed cops were being treated, celebrate shooting, hope cops die. Lancaster, PA riots after domestic violence suspect shot after rushing cops with knife. Biden wants to disarm Americans, while his supporters perpetrate violence across the country. Bystanders, BLM protesters celebrate shooting, say they hope cops die. Trump: If you murder a police officer, you should get the death penalty. Biden can't denounce BLM. Sunday Night Football ratings down. Kaepernick still not happy. Trump mocks NFL. Ravens stood for black national anthem, kneel for real anthem. Seahawks and Falcons kneel during the kickoff. NFL warns on discipline for failure to wear masks on sidelines while players are touching, exchanging spit, breathing on each other on field. Obama deliberately exacerbated racial division. NFL players tested daily, mask is a symbol.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

People starting to echo Rush's belief that Biden won't debate. Biden can't debate. Biden doesn't know where he's going when asked by reporters. Rush on Trump scandals reaching absorption level. Jeffrey Goldberg and F. Chuck Todd admit they've lost their power to shame politicians. Brian Stelter and Errol Louis on Rush, Fox News and Trump. Masks as symbol of fear. Stories on Biden fearing debates. Sundown syndrome: People with dementia typically decline in the nighttime hours. Biden campaign calls "lid" on campaign news at 9 a.m. on Saturday. Other than the primary debates and convention, you don't see Biden much at night, Andrew Gillum comes out as bisexual. Young people used to be taught respect for police officers.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Plugs makes speech from bug-infested wheat field, blames Trump, climate change for wildfires. California energy shortage, fires are the product of their own policies, state is burning alive, liberals keep voting for it. Trump bounds off plane in California, says more in impromptu press conference than Biden did in written speech. California doesn't permit clear-cutting, clearing forests of dead trees, kindling. Caller voted for Obama because he thought it would help end racism, but that was not Obama's intention. Trump has huge edge in small donors. Bloomberg spending to help Biden in Florida for vanity, wants to beat Trump.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
